mode.element:
:- modeb(*,movies(+movieid,-title,-year,-rank,-votes,-director,-name,-writer,-name)). </element
:- modeb(*,movies(-movieid,-title,-year,-rank,-votes,+director,-name,-writer,-name)).
:- modeb(*,movies(-movieid,-title,-year,-rank,-votes,-director,+name,-writer,-name)).
:- modeb(*,movies(-movieid,-title,-year,-rank,-votes,-director,-name,+writer,-name)).
:- modeb(*,movies(-movieid,-title,-year,-rank,-votes,-director,-name,-writer,+name)).
:- modeb(*,genres(+movieid,-genre)).
:- modeb(*,genres(-movieid,+genre)).
:- modeb(*,certificates(+movieid,-country,-certificate)).
:- modeb(*,certificates(-movieid,+country,-certificate)).
:- modeb(*,actors(+actor,-name,-sex)).
:- modeb(*,actors(-actor,+name,-sex)).
:- modeb(*,actors(-actor,-name,+sex)).
:- modeb(*,colorinfo(+movieid,-color)).
:- modeb(*,colorinfo(-movieid,+color)).
:- modeb(*,countries(+movieid,-country)).
:- modeb(*,countries(-movieid,+country)).
:- modeb(*,keywords(+movieid,-keyword)).
:- modeb(*,keywords(-movieid,+keyword)).
:- modeb(*,movies2actors(+movieid,-actor,-character)).
:- modeb(*,movies2actors(-movieid,+actor,-character)).
:- modeb(*,movies2actors(-movieid,-actor,+character)).
:- modeb(*,movies2producers(+movieid,-producer)).
:- modeb(*,movies2producers(-movieid,+producer)).
:- modeb(*,prodcompanies(+movieid,-name)).
:- modeb(*,prodcompanies(-movieid,+name)).
:- modeb(*,producers(+producer,-name)).
:- modeb(*,producers(-producer,+name)).
:- modeb(*,runningtimes(+movieid,-time)).
:- modeb(*,runningtimes(-movieid,+time)).
:- modeb(*,altversions(+movieid,-text)).
:- modeb(*,altversions(-movieid,+text)).
:- modeb(*,business(+movieid,-text)).
:- modeb(*,business(-movieid,+text)).
:- modeb(*,plots(+movieid,-text)).
:- modeb(*,plots(-movieid,+text)).
